description_text:
Again I have not received the order so can you all tell me how I would be
able to review it,  not cool I tell you not good. No one not even you all
likes your money played with.  I'm not saying this in a bad way but please
send me my money,  I no longer have a need for your product. It has been 21
days I ordered expressed shipping. Thanks for your support.

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 5184 中
